name.japanese: ブレイジングソウルビート

description.ultra-sun-ultra-moon:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o,
attacks the opposing Pokémon with full force. This
move boosts the user’s stats.
description.lets-go-pikachu-lets-go-eevee:
After obtaining Z-Power, the user, Kommo-o,
attacks the opposing Pokémon with full force. This
move boosts the user’s stats.
description.sword-shield:
This move can’t be used.
It’s recommended that this move is forgotten.
Once forgotten, this move can’t be remembered.

effect.full: Inflicts sound-based damage to all opposing Pokémon and increases the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each. The user's stats are not raised if the move fails to damage any opposing Pokémon.
effect.shortEffect: Inflicts damage to all opposing Pokémon and increases the user's Attack, Defense, Special Attack, Special Defense, and Speed by one stage each.
